ISSUE.TITLE: currency conversion rate - cannot be changed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Since several weeks, the currency conversion rate (under vendor / invoices) cannot be changed anymore. If changed, then it goes back to either 1 or 0. ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/1aef7e04-ab8f-4c30-b44d-f070f0d29272) ### Dolibarr Version 21 alpha ### Environment PHP _No response_ ### Environment Database _No response_ ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
